name: nextjs-typescript-firebase-hosting
author: Tony Polinelli
description: Next.js / Typescript / Firebase, hosted on cloud functions

scripts.install: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/pages && mkdir dist/static
scripts.predeploy: yarn clean && yarn && yarn build && cd dist && yarn
scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc && next build ./dist && cp package.json dist/package.json && yarn create-public && yarn create-static
scripts.create-static: rm -rf dist/static && mkdir dist/static && cp src/static/* dist/static
